item.title: Universal Windows Apps loves JavaScript!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Would you like to use JavaScript to natively program not only on the web, but also on phones, tablets, desktop and even more devices? This session gives you fresh new air on what you can do today and tomorrow with JavaScript on Windows Platform and beyond! And we give you an update on the latest […]
item.content:encoded: Would you like to use JavaScript to natively program not only on the web, but also on phones, tablets, desktop and even more devices? This session gives you fresh new air on what you can do today and tomorrow with JavaScript on Windows Platform and beyond! And we give you an update on the latest news on the open source journey!
